turkish_example_sentence: Sen bana güzel çiçek versen, ben de sana kitap veririm.
english_example_sentence: If you were to give me a beautiful flower, I would give you a book.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы ты дал мне красивый цветок, я бы дал тебе книгу.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Sen bana güzel çiçek ______, ben de sana kitap veririm.
